name: BladeRage
description:
Now uhhh... My first game? It sucks very much but lets think of it as a stepping stone to some epic ass games :P 

This game is a like 2-3min play with bean models. The goal of the game is killing BBB (Big Bad Boss) and escaping the cave. Other than that there isn't much. The reason I made the game was to gain experience within game development and learning how to use unity. So far I have a pretty good understand how it works so the future looks bright!
